name: Hole N' Fun
description:
Knock robots into holes!

Hole N' Fun was created in a week for the Brackeys 2020 Game Jam by students and  a professor of Wichita State University. We hope you have a blast!

- Shocker Studio Team

------

W/S - Accelerate

Mouse L - HookShot

Mouse R - Boost

Hold Left Shit - Drift

Space - Jump

----

Music by Eric Matyas

Special thanks to Mix N Jam for showing how to build an awesome kart. And Kenney for his wonderful art assets!

Major Contributions from Morgan Padgett, Evan Houck, Reagan Grigsby & Alyssa Stine. Also special thanks to Daniel Johnico and the Game Design 2 Class for your play testing and fun ideas.
